Assemble website URL

Source: R/c2d.gen.R
url_website.Rd

Assemble website URL

url_website(
  ...,
  .use_testing_server = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "use_testing_server", pkg = this_pkg)
)

Arguments

...

Optional path components added to the base URL.

.use_testing_server

Whether or not to use the testing servers instead of the production servers for C2D Services API calls etc.

Value

A character scalar.

Examples

c2d:::url_website("referendum/CH/5bbc04f692a21351232e5a01")
#> [1] "https://c2d.ch/referendum/CH/5bbc04f692a21351232e5a01"
